00002 /*! return a transposed column vector */
00003 inline _dcovector t(const _drovector& rovec)
00004 {VERBOSE_REPORT;
00005   _dcovector covec;
00006   covec.l =rovec.l;
00007   covec.cap =rovec.cap;
00008   delete [] covec.array;
00009   covec.array =rovec.array;
00010   
00011   rovec.nullify();
00012   return covec;
00013 }

00016 /*! return its Euclidean norm */
00017 inline double nrm2(const _drovector& vec)
00018 {VERBOSE_REPORT;
00019   double val( dnrm2_(vec.l, vec.array, 1) );
00020   vec.destroy();
00021   return val;
00022 }
